text: I may not be big on racing games, but that doesn't mean I'm not big on their soundtracks. Another great upload. I'm gonna start guessing what's 900 soon I guess, get ahead of the crowd. In other words I'm gonna spend most of the day looking back through the whole list. When you get to vid 1000 that's gonna become quite a task. I can't imagine a number like say 10000 and going through the whole list(assuming we get that far). But I ain't losing faith, it's still possible. VGM forever.
